item.description:
We need a hike idea for today. Sign up and list your choice! 3 RSVP's create a meetup, 4 for winter conditions.

Several of us are interested in Moosilauke so I am setting that as the choice. We will go up the Glencliff Trail to the Carriage Road, with an optional stop at the South peak. This is 8.2 miles and 3500' of elevation. Thats a book time of 5 hours 50 minutes.

Map and directions here

Snowshoes and crampons will be needed. Weather is looking good. Temps in the 20s with a moderate wind. The top of Moosilauke is exposed so you should be equipped with face mask and goggles along with plenty of layers.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the Disclaimer and things you must know. Read What to wear on a hike and pack water and food
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be driving a red SUV. Cell # 603-479-4074
item.name: Hiker's Choice: Moosilauke by Glencliff
